Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 92,
  freq_weight: 'Z',
  time_weight: 'impulse',
  la: 102.4,
  laeq: 76.8,
  lamax: 51.2,
  class_type: 'class-a'
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 92 },
  'snr:0': { unitId: 'dB', record: 102.4, nature: 'A-weighted sound level (la)' },
  'snr:1': { unitId: 'dB', record: 76.8, nature: 'Equivalent continuous sound level (laeq)' },
  'snr:2': { unitId: 'dB', record: 51.2, nature: 'Maximum sound pressure level (lamax)' }
}
